name: cloudburst
notes:
**finished measurements**
circumference 17cm/ 6.8 inches, length 21cm/ 8.4 inches.

**yarn**
40 gr. 140m/ 154 yards of fingering/ sport weight yarn.
sample uses rauma finullgarn in colour 403 (100% non superwash wool 175m/ 192 yards per
50gr.)

**gauge**
30 st. per 10 cm/ 4 inches, 45 rounds per 10 cm/ 4 inches, stockinette in the round.

**needles**
size to get gauge (i used 3mm/ u.s. 2.5 needles), 60 cm/ 24-inch circular or dpns.

**notions**
waste yarn.

**techniques**
lace.
longtail cast on.
backwards loop cast on.
picking up stitches.
bind of in pattern.

**credits**
thanks to my testknitters, and to my boyfriend for taking photos and supporting me. 

thanks to judith [little--knitter](/people/little--knitter) for the translation to german.
